mapper.sql: id, name, atype, activityTime, activityAddress, endTime, activityPictures, price, createTime, anumber, remarks
mapper.insert:
insert into activity
id,
name,
atype,
activityTime,
activityAddress,
endTime,
activityPictures,
price,
createTime,
anumber,
remarks,
content,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{atype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{activitytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{activityaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{activitypictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update activity
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
atype = #{atype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activityTime = #{activitytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activityAddress = #{activityaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activityPictures = #{activitypictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
anumber = #{anumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, atype = #{atype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activityTime = #{activitytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityAddress = #{activityaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityPictures = #{activitypictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, anumber = #{anumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, atype = #{atype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activityTime = #{activitytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityAddress = #{activityaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityPictures = #{activitypictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, anumber = #{anumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from activity where 1=1
and name like "%${name}%"
and atype = #{atype,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{createtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by createTime desc
